TITLE: Focus
EFFECT: Gain 1 / 2 / 3 crystal charges. They do not have channel time.

TITLE: Haste
EFFECT: When you are the initiator, use 1 / 2 / 3 dice to assign damage, reinforce, or channel. Then, reroll those dice.
CRYSTALLIZED: Use 2 dice to assign damage, reinforce, or channel. Then, reroll those dice.

TITLE: Parry
EFFECT:
If target character was assigned damage this turn:
- Reassign 1 / 2 / 2 damage from that character.
- Reinforce 0 / 1 / 2 to that character.

TITLE: Ruin
EFFECT: Assign 1 / 3 / 5 damage to a single target.
CRYSTALLIZED: Assign 2 damage to a single target.
